about_the_game:
Repeat After Death is an action arcade game where your actions become your own enemy. Make your way through the various dungeons and kill the monster with your attacks. Repeat this over and over again until you clear the dungeon. Simple enough, right? But beware, as your actions from every character before will haunt you and be repeated back in your next. Dodge your way through the many ghosts of your own movement to kill the monster and get out of this looping purgatory.

Deck of Personalities

Choose at least 3 of your favorite characters each run to cycle between to clear the dungeon with. The Deck of Personalities will shuffle them up and give one to you at random for every iteration. Will you combine the speed of the rogue, the imaginative power of the wizard, and the entertaining mind of the jester in one team? Or do you dare challenge yourself by taking on all your different personalities at once?

Discover Yourself

Where are you? Who are you? How did you end up in this place? Talk to the different characters around the dungeon to figure out why you were brought here and how to escape this never-ending cycle. Discover something buried deep down in your past, and when the time comes, you must choose to either fight until the bitter end or accept who you truly are.

- Get items throughout each run to help you clear the dungeon

- Buy different upgrades in the shop to make each run stronger and more impactful than the last using coins and gems you obtain in the dungeon

- Test out each character’s attacks and abilities in the training room

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Celeron (R) N4100 CPU @ 1.10 GHz (4 CPU) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 / Radeon HD 5850
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050 TI / Radeon R9 280X
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: The task is simple, defeat enemies using various Characters. But, your past move will consume you the more you continue down the path. Discover the dungeon mysteries while engaging with the other dungeon dwellers
